page.title: 06Continued
page.content: We have last play at 2.15. It finishes at at 2.30 and we go to the top classroom and have a story. At 2.50 we put our chairs up on our tables and say a going home prayer. School finishes at three o' clock and my Mummy takes me back home. When I get home I unpack my things and go upstairs to get changed. When I come downstairs I have a drink and a biscuit. I play with my toys for a while. I watch TV at a quarter past four and at five o' clock I have my tea. After tea I watch TV for a while then I have to go upstairs and read my brother a story. I have a shower and go downstairs. I have a cup of tea and read a book. At a quarter to eight I brush my teeth and go to bed. When I get to bed I read for a while and then go to sleep.
